meanings.definition: A brand of dairy-free, vegan food products made from tofu.
meanings.sent1: I bought some tofutti ice cream for my lactose-intolerant friend.
meanings.sent2: The store carries a variety of tofutti cheeses for those who are vegan.
meanings.sent3: At the party, everyone was surprised by how delicious the tofutti cream cheese was.
meanings.sent4: Her love for tofutti yogurt was like a beacon of light in her dairy-free journey.
meanings.sent5: The tofutti milkshake was a refreshing treat on a hot summer day.

meanings.definition: To mimic or imitate the taste or texture of dairy products using tofu.
meanings.sent1: She tried tofutti butter as a healthier alternative to dairy butter.
meanings.sent2: The chef used tofu tofutti to create a vegan version of a classic cheesecake.
meanings.sent3: His attempt to make tofutti ice cream at home ended in a sticky mess.
meanings.sent4: The restaurant's tofutti lasagna was a clever twist on a traditional dish.
meanings.sent5: The tofutti pudding replicated the creamy texture of traditional dairy desserts.
